stories.original_headline: Astronomers just revealed a stunning new view of the Milky Way in radio colors
stories.original_summary: A groundbreaking new radio image reveals the Milky Way in more detail than ever before, using low-frequency radio “colors” to map the galaxy’s hidden structures. stories.fantasy_headline: Celestial Wizards Unveil Hidden Wonders of the Starry Path!
stories.fantasy_story: The Order of Celestial Wizards has revealed a magnificent new scroll. It depicts the Starry Path in never-before-seen ethereal lights, showing both new star-births and the remnants of ancient wonders. This scroll is sharper and wider than any previously known.

stories.fantasy_headline: Celestial Oracles Discover a Shadow Maw Consuming Too Swiftly!
stories.fantasy_story: The esteemed Celestial Oracles have found a strange phenomenon in the farthest reaches of the Cosmic Tapestry. A great Shadow Maw, linked to a distant Cosmic Beacon, is devouring matter at an impossible speed. It defies all known laws of the cosmos, growing far quicker than any sage predicted.

stories.original_headline: The Loch Capsule dishwasher is small, fast, and efficient — it even sanitizes gadgets
stories.original_summary: A dishwasher is a luxury item some people can't live without. It's one of the first major kitchen devices I bought just as soon as I could afford one, and the appliance I thought I'd miss most in my nomadic vanlife pursuits. Loch sent me its $459.99 / €459.99 countertop Capsule dishwasher to review
stories.fantasy_headline: Loch Clan's Small Enchanted Purifier Cleanses Plates and Trinkets!
stories.fantasy_story: The clever artificers of the Loch Clan have crafted a wondrous new enchanted device. This compact Plate Purifier works quickly and efficiently, not only cleaning dishes but also magically cleansing small personal artifacts. It's perfect for those dwelling in nomadic caravans or small abodes, making daily chores much simpler.
